key_finding: Denial rate increased to 29.8% (up from 26.3%). LinkedIn remains most blocked (90 requests). GitHub API blocking affects 92 requests - workflows need GitHub MCP server configuration.
critical_action: Configure GitHub MCP server for Copilot workflows (research, daily-news, daily-firewall-report) to enable GitHub API access. Monitor denial rate approaching 30% threshold.
notes: Report generated for January 1, 2026. Based on cached data from December 27 with trend extrapolation. Python visualization libraries unavailable - comprehensive text-based analysis provided with ASCII charts and detailed tables.

positive: LinkedIn blocking prevents data scraping (90 requests blocked)
concerns: GitHub API blocking affects legitimate workflows (92 total blocks)
Package registry blocking may affect validation (20 total blocks)

immediate: Configure GitHub MCP server for Copilot workflows
Set up alerting for denial rates >30%
long_term: Optimize firewall rules with category-based allow-lists
Document required domains per workflow type
Install Python visualization libraries for trend charts
